subject: Re: [junit] Yet another runner
msgSnippet: ... Another runner I ve not seen mentioned on here is the new JUnit integration that IntelliJ have included in the new EAP releases of Idea - its dang sure
messageBody:
On Wed, 23 Apr 2003 10:33:28 +1200, Vladimir R. Bossicard wrote:

> As some of you have already noticed, I have released the code of a

integration that IntelliJ have included in the new EAP releases of Idea -
its dang sure purty ;-)

I'll have to plonk a screenshot online somewhere.

Mark
